item.description:
Expose your LOs to the Korean language with our weekly playdate! We'll read Korean stories, enjoy Korean snacks and sing Korean songs.

Moms, don't let your minimal or nonexistent Korean intimate you...(we speak mostly in English).

If you are interested in hosting or can't make Tuesday afternoons please send a message to Yooree. A monthly weekend playdate is in the works.
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet Kara and Ethan in the lobby by 3:05
item.name: Weekly Korean playdate
